index.name: Maintainable MVC - Clean controllers that are easy on the eyes.
index.description:
ASP.NET MVC controllers are often dumping grounds for code. The amount of things happening in any given controller can make code difficult to read, understand, and maintain.

We'll talk about ways to clean this up. We'll discuss principles of clean code, the single responsibility principle, command query separation, the mediator patternâ€¦all sorts of things to help you write controllers that don't leave you scratching your head a month later.
